---
title: "Diversity Boxplots"
author: "Tim Johnson"
date: "August 31, 2016"
output: html_document
---

Produce boxplots of Richness estimates from the BMD experiment

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
setwd("~/Desktop/BMD_turkeys/data/")

alpha_div <- read.csv(file = "BMD_alpha_diversity.csv", header = T)
unique(alpha_div$day)
str(alpha_div)
alpha_div$trt_day <- paste(alpha_div$trt, alpha_div$day, sep = "_")
str(alpha_div)
subset(alpha_div, trt_day=="ctrl_14")

qplot(trt, chao, geom = "boxplot", colour = trt, data = subset(alpha_div, location == "cc"), facets = .~day)


```
